name: Nintendo Switch
description: Nintendo Switch gaming console with versatile play modes for every gamer.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
description: An open-world adventure game that offers an immersive gaming experience.

name: Nintendo Switch Pro Controller
description: Enhance your gaming experience with the Nintendo Switch Pro Controller.

name: Mario Kart 8 Deluxe
description: Race your friends or battle them in a revised battle mode on new and returning battle courses.

name: Nintendo Switch Lite
description: Compact and lightweight with a sleek, unibody design, Nintendo Switch Lite is great for on-the-go gaming.

name: Animal Crossing: New Horizons
description: Escape to a deserted island and create your own paradise as you explore, create, and customize in the Animal Crossing: New Horizons game.

name: Nintendo Switch Joy-Con
description: The versatile Joy-Con offer multiple surprising new ways for players to have fun.

name: Super Mario Odyssey
description: Join Mario on a massive, globe-trotting 3D adventure and use his incredible new abilities to collect Moons so you can power up your airship, the Odyssey.

name: Nintendo Switch Carrying Case & Screen Protector
description: This case will protect the console when taking Nintendo Switch on the go, and the screen protector will help keep the screen free from scratches.

name: Splatoon 2
description: Ink-splatting action is back and fresher than ever in Splatoon 2, a chaotic team-based shooter.
